text: The first generation computers made use of
explanation: The first generation of computers relied on machine language(a low-level programming language) instructions and used vacuum tubes in their construction.

text: Microprocessor was used as the main electronic component of the
explanation: Microprocessor was used as the main electronic component of the fourth generation computers. Fourth Generation of computers was between 1971 – 1980. These computers used the VLSI technology or the Very Large Scale Integrated (VLSI) circuits technology. Therefore they were also known as the microprocessors. Intel was the first company to develop a microprocessor. The first “personal computer” or PC developed by IBM, belonged to this generation.

text: The act of producing information from figures, text or images is called data
The following are primary sources of information except
explanation: Primary Sources: These sources are records of events or evidence as they are first described or happened without any interpretation or commentary. It is information that is shown for the first time or original materials on which other research is based. Examples are theses, dissertations, scholarly journal articles (research-based), some government reports, symposia, conference proceedings, original artwork, poems, photographs, speeches, letters, memos, personal narratives, diaries, interviews, autobiographies, and correspondence.

Another term for Uniform Resources Locator (URL) is
explanation: A URL (Uniform Resource Locator) is a unique identifier used to locate a resource on the Internet. It is also referred to as a web address. URLs consist of multiple parts -- including a protocol and domain name -- that tell a web browser how and where to retrieve a resource.

text: The website "www.google.com" indicates that Google is
explanation: Google.com is a commercial organization that makes money majorly from advertising.

Which of the following formulas would calculate the average score of the students in Mathematics?
explanation:
Average: To calculate the average of a range of numbers in Excel, you can use the AVERAGE function. The basic syntax for the AVERAGE function is:=AVERAGE(number1, [number2], ...)For example, to calculate the average of the values in cells A1 to A5, you can use the formula:=AVERAGE(A1:A5)
Therefore OPTION A is correct.

text: Arranging records in a file according to a particular order is referred to as
One advantage of indexed sequential file organization is that

options.A: index tables are small and can be searched quickly
options.C: it is suitable for dynamically changing files

explanation: It is suitable for dynamically changing files, akey advantage of indexed sequential file organization. This method allows for efficient updates, insertions, and deletions, making it well-suited for frequently changing files.

text: The protection of database against compromise is known as
explanation: Database security refers to tools, controls, and measures to establish and preserve database confidentiality, integrity, and availability.
